actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-781, by Ms. Slaughter.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5334 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Specified amendments are in order. It shall be in order to consider the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Banking now printed in the bill. All points of order against the substitute for failure to comply with clause 5 (a) of rule XXI shall be waived. No amendment to said substitute shall be in order, except those printed in the report accompanying this resolution (H. Rpt. 102-781), said amendments to be considered read and debatatble for 20 minutes each and shall not be subject to amendment or a demand for division. All points of order against the amendments shall be waived.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 187.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 244 - 163 (Roll no. 362).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 154 (Roll no. 363).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5334) to amend and extend certain laws relating to housing and community development, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5334 (housing and community development).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5334) to amend and extend certain laws relating to housing and community development, and for other purposes.
